name: markdown-viewer

status.description: The sample component set has reached end of life and will not be updated

description: A component which interprets and displays strings in the GITHub version of markdown (.md) format

value.description: String in markdown format to be converted for display (Required)

flavor.description: Select one of the sub-dialects of markdown to support

outputFilter.description: Callback function which you can define to sanitize the HTML output generated for the viewer. This function should return a promise to the sanitized HTML string

htmlRendering.description: Provides additional control over styling such as header sizes in rendered markdown

legacy.description: Provides some minor override formatting for lists and pre elements

inherit.description: Pick up all HTML styles from the application

redwood.description: Optimized header sizing for when the application is running in the Redwood theme
